website_summaries.verdict: Made for active boys and parents who want an effective barrier from the sun at a great price.
pros: Thick fabric shields skin from sun damage, yet still feels light enough to swim
Provides a decent amount of full upper-body protection from the sun
cons: Reports suggest sizing may run small

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I'm buying more for summer...the kids don't get hot at all.
customer_reviews.text: I got size 6T for my 4 year old, but he is a bit bigger for his age. I think for a 6 year old it would be right on spot or a bit tight. Great quality. Loving it for it to keep my son cool at school, mosquito bites free. I use it in combination with the pants of the set Huanqiue Boys Swimsuit UPF50+ UV Two Piece Protective Blue Long.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rapagnani

customer_reviews.title: ... get the shirt on and off a little more easily and would have room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4T for my 2T lady so we could get the shirt on and off a little more easily and would have room to grow. I have to roll up the sleeves but it's better than fighting with a skin tight shirt! I like the feel of the fabric. The decal is cute, but it is starting to flake off (which is to be expected!). The most important thing for me is that she is protected from UV rays, and it seems to be doing a good job as far as that goes. Overall for the price I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lasted well for a week-long trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1.5 year old. He is in the 92 percentile for height. Just barely too long in the length of the shirt, and I had to roll up the sleeves. I knew this would be the case bc I was buying a size up for him. Good quality, lasted well for a week-long trip to Lake Powell. Fit well over the neck and not hard to put on or take off, even when wet. Kept him from getting sunburned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection and warmth.
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this rash guard. Long torso, sleeves, and high neck. Keeps my little one (20 months, 23lbs, in 2T) unburned and warm in cold waters. Dries fast and looks cute. I highly revommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teeny

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: First time shopping with this vendor. Shipping was quick (thanks Amazon Prime), and the product turned out to be just what we were looking for. The higher collar gives a bit more protection than a crew neck would. The material seems to be good. We'll see if the emblem on the front lasts very long. No big deal if it doesn't. Try this, as I think you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: BlackBelt4

customer_reviews.title: Discolors after one use!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wore this one time to the country club pool and it discolored to a nasty yellow except where his water wings were. It is difficult to see in the photo but easy to see first hand. The fabric is nice and it did a great job blocking the sun. I just would never buy white!!
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: it seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Hawaii. I think the sleeves are a bit too long. Other than that, it seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: BuyBuyBuy

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt at the price point
customer_reviews.text: This was great and did exactly what we needed it to do: keep the sun off my kid in the pool on vacation. Fit was a little loose, but not so much that it didn’t stay close to the body. It stayed down in the water, which was perfect for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna C

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Our son wears 3T/4T clothing and 4T fits him well, with room to grow. This is a really nice swim shirt. The fabric is high quality and it is well made. I'm sad though because we took it to the beach and sand got embedded in the fabric so it just looks perpetually dirty now (we bought white). I wonder if I could use a power washer or something to get the sand out of the fibers. But overall great swim shirt. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Abc123

customer_reviews.title: I got the green 5t...good product and came early
customer_reviews.text: So excited that I got this earlier than I expected! It was due to be delivered between May21-june 6 and I got it today. I ordered way before the pool opened here in South Dakota so I'm glad I got it today. I tried it on him and it fit a little baggy which is to be expected because he is 5. The material is thick and stretchy like any typical swimwear shirt. I typically order a size up so he can grow I to it. I haven't tried it in the water or sun yet but all in all, I am super happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white one to deflect the heat. It works great, and feels comfortable for my son.
customer_reviews.author: SKMG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sun protection at a great price. My son is 43” tall and 48 lbs and it’s fits with just a bit of room to grow into but not noticeably too large. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: BwHow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the thickness and quality of the rash guard. We normally buy Lands End and pay much more but we needed it fast for a beach trip. My 8 year old son even commented about the fit and feel of the material. I work in a Cancer center so I highly recommend protecting your skin and this is a great product to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I got two long sleeve bathing suits for my son this summer, one is this one and the other one is from target. My son wears the one from target more and this one less as a backup, while this one looks like on the picture after two or three wash
customer_reviews.author: Bright

customer_reviews.title: Color FADE
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my son. Before I realized the color fades over a weeks time, I ordered a second one. This is my second review. I still have not heard from the company regarding a refund. We are avid swimmers and were looking forward to continued sun protection. I would NOT recommend this product. Sadly, it did not live up to my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: E. Richeal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer shirt
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, fits him well-he is lanky and long and we ordered the 6 (5yo, almost 6) and fits great. Not skin tight, and is very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: Cool shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shirt. Thick material and breathable. My son was hit by a jellyfish the first day he wore it. I believe it would of been much worse if he did not have this shirt on. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a good quality sun protection swim shirt! This is a great quality shirt for the price. Would def recommend. My son weighs 43 pounds and we ordered the 5t. It’s a little loose, but not too big that he can’t wear it. This is one of the better brands on amazon. Tried another one that was “amazon’s choice” and it was super thin and way too big. I plan to order more colors. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janel Aguada

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Therapists said it's perfect, and after going to sport store to buy there's for $30 bucks this was the better fit and price.
customer_reviews.author: dewayna

customer_reviews.title: Quality material!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific thick but comfortable material. Son loves the design. Only wore once so far, but very pleased. Will update with any changes. My son is about 42 pounds and 43 inches tall and the size 5T was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: NYCmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for boogie boarding
customer_reviews.text: We don’t use these as much for the sun protection factor as we do for protecting my kids when they are boogie boarding. They did a great job holding up to a bunch of boys playing around on the beach. They also wash and wear well!
customer_reviews.author: R and L

customer_reviews.title: Great for fair-skinned babes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for fair-skinned babes! Makes life a little easier by not having to reapply sunscreen ALL OVER. Highly recommend! 😎
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: Every rash guard I see has a design on it to match specific bottoms. I bought a couple of sizes and they were perfect solids to mix and match with his 10 million bathing suits! They are slightly big so I expect them to fit next summer too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SWIM SHIRT
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. The grey color matches every swim trunk my son owns so this swim shirt has been a great addition. It fits him perfectly and we've had no issues with quality. Would buy again and recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: KBurd25

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Hawaii. He seemed comfortable in it all day
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt has been fantastic. We have been in Florida and this shirt gets worn nearly every day. It has held up in chlorine, the beach, and countless washings. I would certainly buy again and will when kid grows out of it. The shape has held strong too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of this rash guard. Some companies don’t understand that toddlers have long torsos and make them too short on the belly. This fits so great and gives good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my child. He is very fair skinned and this did a marvelous job at protecting him while we spent the day at the beach. The quality was incredible. The fit was great, and true to size. It washed well in the machine and seemed comfortable for him to wear. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My sons wears it all the time. The material doesn’t seem as sturdy as other rash guards. Seems to wrinkle easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Useful, cute, but can’t get completely clean
customer_reviews.text: Light weight protection. Son feels comfortable in it. I bought white to match any swim trunk pattern. Minus one star for sand somehow getting inside the shirt. So it is now a specked shirt and the sand does not come out in the wash. Now it looks dirty (well technically it is with the sand) all the time. However my son does not feel the sand scratching him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The sleeves are slightly shorter than we'd like but he is happy with it. Just have to make sure to put sunscreen on him between his hands and where the shirt ends. He says he wants more of this shirt to wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice and does its job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product but only for very skinny kids. It fit my youngest very well, but would never have been able to use it on his brother who is far from being overweight but still sturdy. Consider larger sises when buying
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good at first!
customer_reviews.text: It looked and started out well enough, but then after 2 wash and wear, it stretches and hung down to my 7yo mid-thigh. The sleeves and neck area too. Very poor quality and wont hold up for more than 2 wears.
customer_reviews.author: Timer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: It looked just like the picture and served its purpose. My son wears 3t shirts and that’s what I purchased. My son is very skinny though and this fitted. It might not be a bad idea to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Consumer
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 years old and wears a size 4T. I went with the 5T because of the reviews about the shirt fitting snug. The 5T is perfect. It doesn't fit snug ... it fits just fine and the good thing is that it'll last him through next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly small
customer_reviews.text: The rash guard is adorable, fits a little small on my 2.5 year old girl but it will do for now. She is obsessed with baby shark so loves this shirt
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: The shirt fits as expected but the quality is horrible. Fell apart after using it about 8 times. Lost its elcticity and now it looks like a loose fitting shirt. I can't even return it since it's a week past the return window date. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: This is a great rash guard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rash guard. I'm disappointed in the images because they've started to peel away after a few swims. But it's still wearable and been washed and hung dry many times.
customer_reviews.author: Cam R

customer_reviews.title: Saves my son from sunburns.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a redhead with Very fair skin. Trying to reapply sunscreen on a 4 year old every 2 hours, and then keep him out of the water for 20 minutes is torture. This is a lifesaver
customer_reviews.author: Karen P Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Sun Protection, Size
customer_reviews.text: My son and I like this rashguard so much that I am ordering another one after I accidentally left it at our local spray deck. It has protected my 5 yr old from the sun at the beach the last 2 summers and has held up through 1 year of 2x/wk swim classes. My son does not like his chest exposed in the pool and this is perfect. The fit was a smidge big but b/c the quality of the shirt is so good it has lasted while he is growing into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Two different fits for size 4T
customer_reviews.text: I just got two sun shirt for my 4 years old, i purchased size 4T and I am pretty sure that one of them is 3T although package says 4T. See pictures! Hi Estamico how can we fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this rash guard. It is thick and stretchy and and is not ridiculously small like many of the others I ordered. Plus I liked the cute sail boat on the front. After only 3 or 4 uses though, the image started to peel off. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs sand
customer_reviews.text: This rash guard is ok. Somehow at the beach the material absorbed sand. Even after washing, the rash guard has tiny specks of sand all over it inside the material and I can’t understand how this is even possible! It is still wearable but just looks dirty all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decal doesn't look very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is very cute and the sizing looks correct, however, it appears the decal was just put on before it shipped and I question whether it will survive the summer. Regardless, it is cute and my grandson will love it and ultimately it will do the job but I just don't think the decal will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage at the pool. Holding up against being rubbed on concrete. Ordered big so he can wear it next year too.
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 3T for my 2 year old grandson, he loved it the minute it arrived. It was a tiny bit big, which I wanted so it will fit all summer. The green color looked great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best sun protector ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the beach this summer. He wore it and we never had to worry about sunburned shoulders. Even in 95degrees he never complained of being hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ahouchin

customer_reviews.title: Great for boys
customer_reviews.text: Runs true to size. Bought a size up to make sure it lasts all summer. Good thickness of Material. Washes well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunguard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rashguard shirt in various sizes for my five grandsons on a trip to Hawaii. I wanted them all to match for photos. They were perfect. They washed well and the boys wore them to the pool, beach, and on excursions. They fit well landlocked great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bostwick

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt for swimming! Thicker material than previous rash guards I’ve purchased for my son, which I think is probably good for protection in the Florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: Rich/Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fits great for my son
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended from our son’s swim instructor. It fits great.
customer_reviews.author: William Halstead Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: bought the size up for my daughter to use more than one year and it works great. The fit is a little loose but that was intended. Quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Soncerae McCune

customer_reviews.title: Runs latge
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product and great value. Note that they run large though my son normally wears a boys 5 or XS and we had to return twice until we settled on the size 4 which is still large on himz
customer_reviews.author: obsessedamazon

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 years in a row
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 years in a row. Good quality for the most part. By the end of the season the decal starts to peal but material is good.
customer_reviews.author: Narissa Dunninger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, small fit
customer_reviews.text: Shirt seems to be made of high quality fabric. My recommendation would be to size up...my son is solidly in a 7/8 size and the 10T in this fit him pretty well. Overall body length is good, but the sleeves are a little short, not quite covering his wrists. For the price though, definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KatherineRD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. We are going to the beach, and I wanted a long sleeve rash guard for my son. This is perfect! While my son is tall for his age, the sizing does seem to be a little small. He’s 3 and the 6 fit him pretty perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Britni McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & adorable for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Fit my 2 year old grandson perfect! He wore it everyday! Nice fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme L. Nyp

customer_reviews.title: The shirt work great my grandson is bright red hair white skin burn ...
customer_reviews.text: The shirt work great my grandson is bright red hair white skin burn so easily the shirt made all the difference in the world love it no more sunburn
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Keeps him cool
customer_reviews.text: Great rash guard. My son loves it. Fair skin and daily swim lessons at the beach make this a must. He stays cool even when it’s hot out.
customer_reviews.author: LRemiah

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO small! This would have fit my 5 year ...
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO small! This would have fit my 5 year old, and I ordered for my tall 12 year old. Returned immediately. Fix the sizing!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to name brand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my toddler to wear to water parks and splash pads. It fits well and seems to keep him protected from the sun. This is comparable to the iplay brand rash guard.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Easy comfortable roomy fit
customer_reviews.text: Great roomy fit. Arms are long but then he’ll wear it longer.
customer_reviews.author: anna giuliano

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stuff. Fits to size.. Easy to clean Saves from skin cancer!
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Protects my son from the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Our son has a sun allergy so he wears these UV shirts daily. They're comfortable and for him well they dry fast and keep him cool even though he's on a long sleeve shirt.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter as girl's shirts tend to be too tight. It works well and looks super cute on her.
customer_reviews.author: CELake

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I ordered a 3T when our son is ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I ordered a 3T when our son is in 2T so hopefully it will fit all summer long. Was great for the lake beach side in June, keep him warm in the cool water and protected from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and just what I needed for my 9 month old. Has done a great job at protecting him from the sun as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Garner

customer_reviews.title: Sand gets stuck in layers
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is great in fit and sun protection but one trip to the beach and it’s full of sand! The sand got trapped between the layers and looks dirty and gross. Quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LMP84

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! My son loves this swim shirt! Easy to get on and off, color is vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Not to hot to wear and blocks the sun. This shirt dries quickly and my son had no complaints about wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Weird white footprint
customer_reviews.text: There is a weird white footprint on the front of it. Maybe it will come out in the wash?
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Krukowski

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with hole.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole in the side seem. We needed it immediately, so just kept it. Its soso.
customer_reviews.author: EMTUSS

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Has washed well. Shirt is good quality. It is also soft.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this shirt was smaller than I thought it should be, I had sized up so it did fit. We went on vacation to Mexico my son wore this every day for 7 days while in the pool, on about day 5 the lettering started to peel off! It was a cute shirt and it worked for preventing sun burn it just looked bad when it peeled off!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: great quality. Had to order size up as runs ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute rash guard, great quality. Had to order size up as runs little small.
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: See through fabric and odd sleeve length
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality fabric and odd fit. The fabric is see through which I found disappointing and wonder if it will protect my son from the sun. The arm length is rather short, so rather than being a long sleeve swim shirt it sits a few inches above my son’s wrist. The short looks cheap due to the poor quality fabric, see through fabric and odd sleeve length.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Mostly like
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little more neon than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jinae Carr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Great color, size and fit. Would purchase in another color
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Fabric doesnt hold well!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it at first but he went into the pool a couple of times and the fabric just stretched out. One arm was way longer than the other than the materiel started flaking off and it was fading. I put it only in the washer and always hanged dried it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fit. Received on time.
customer_reviews.text: Very fit. My son is 4 and the rashguard isn't large. Received on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, high-quality
customer_reviews.text: Material is substantial and comfortable. I love the clean lines and lack of branding. Price was great. it’s a favorite
customer_reviews.author: J. Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11yo. Purchased a Large. Fits. Not as snug as I had hoped but fits, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: Best for tall skinny kids
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves and torso are very long. I had to roll the sleeves up twice to make it work. However, sizing down would have probably made the fit too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, but took a long time to come and is MADE IN CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shirt in November of 2018. Wore it for a weekend during Christmas, and it has stretched out and can no longer be worn because it continues to expand when my son wears it in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Great color. Seems to be well made. Looks great on our little guy and was exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Van Liew

customer_reviews.title: The shirt is a good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a fairly small 8 year old, and we purchased the size 10 shirt. It fits him well. The sleeves are a little bit short, but I'd prefer that over too long. The shirt is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The material is good quality, but it is poorly stitched. Single stitched with buckling seams. I don’t know how it got high ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves long
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are a little long on this but I’ll save it for my son for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great material and design with bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Great material and design with bright colors, which I always use in a pool to spot my kiddos easily! Great price, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SLee

customer_reviews.title: Order a bigger size you’d normally order fir your child
customer_reviews.text: Great shirts. Ordered 3 of the smallest and will definitely buy more. My son will be 4 in a week, 44lbs and 42.5 inches. I thought they would be way bigger but they fit him well except for the sleeves which are a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: books

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit - stains easily
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rash guard & good fit, I do not recommend white for children. Stains do not wash out, worn 3 times now trash
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: A little snug
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swim shirt my son doesn’t want to take it off. It is a bit more snug than his regular size 2t clothes but it will do fine for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Becki Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. The sleeves are not finished off with stitching at the wrists and one of them was even ripped. The emblem in the middle is cracked already. Awful. I need to sems this garbage back.
customer_reviews.author: Koshea M.

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems nice, I think I could have gotten a size ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems nice, I think I could have gotten a size bigger. The sleeves seem to be a bit short, but otherwise it fits my son well. We'll see how it holds up over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Jay

customer_reviews.title: Too big, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up as recommended in the other reviews, and it won't be fitting him until next summer. The quality seems to be good though.
customer_reviews.author: DevJac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit. Very happy with the purchase delivery was made before expected
customer_reviews.author: Irma Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: Sizing very old
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size, must order two to three size bigger unless your child is super skinny and has a tiny head. I am not kidding you!
customer_reviews.author: R. E. LEWIS~HYDER

customer_reviews.title: Hole
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, fit well. BUT... After one use, there is a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

product_meta.title: ESTAMICO Boys' UPF 50+ Long-Sleeve Rashguard Athletic Swim Shirt
product_meta.description:
ESTAMICO Boys Rash Guard - Features long sleeves and 82% Nylon, 18% Spandex fabric. Breathable, quick drying, stretchy and flexible for sports. UPF 50+ rating perfect for allday sun protection.

After Sale Service:
If you have any problem with this shopping, Please contact with us first. We will solve well for you and we promise that we never let you suffer any loss. Thank you!

Care Instruction:
Wash with gentle detergent
Do not wash hard to printing pattern
Do not bleach.
Guaranteed high quality and excellent service.
feature_bullets: Slim Fit: 18% spandex fabric with good elastic, order a Size Up if you don't like tighter fitting.CARE INSTRUCTION: Hand wash reverse side and use gentle detergent,do not scrub and iron printing pattern
Durable stretchy Fabric quick dry long sleeved swim tops
Upf 50+ Protection Shirts Stop Sun Burns
Perfect for swimming, playing at the beach or going to the water park, the long sleeve t- shirt design provides extra sun protection for your little ones
Not see through and no bleading/Return or exchange is free
